title: Group conditional validity via multi-group learning. (arXiv:2303.03995v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: We consider the problem of distribution-free conformal prediction and the criterion of group conditional validity. This criterion is motivated by many practical scenarios including hidden stratification and group fairness. Existing methods achieve such guarantees under either restrictive grouping structure or distributional assumptions, or they are overly-conservative under heteroskedastic noise. We propose a simple reduction to the problem of achieving validity guarantees for individual populations by leveraging algorithms for a problem called multi-group learning. This allows us to port theoretical guarantees from multi-group learning to obtain obtain sample complexity guarantees for conformal prediction. We also provide a new algorithm for multi-group learning for groups with hierarchical structure. Using this algorithm in our reduction leads to improved sample complexity guarantees with a simpler predictor structure.

translated_title: 多组学习实现群组条件有效性
translated_abstract: 本文研究无分布限制置信度预测问题，着重讨论群组条件有效性的准则。这一准则具有许多实际应用，例如隐藏分层和群组公平。现有的方法要么受限于特定的分组结构或分布假设，要么在异方差噪声下过于保守。我们提出一个简单的规约，将实现群体条件有效性的问题转化为解决一种多组学习问题。这使我们能够通过借助多组学习算法的理论保证来获得置信度预测的样本复杂度保证。我们还提供了一种新的针对具有分层结构的群体的多组学习算法。在我们的规约中使用此算法可带来改进的样本复杂度保证和更简单的预测结构。
tldr: 本文提出了一种实现群组条件有效性的方法，通过将问题规约为多组学习问题，从而解决了现有方法中受限于特定分组结构或分布假设等问题。同时，利用一种新的多组学习算法，进一步提高了样本复杂度保证和简化预测结构。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a method to achieve group conditional validity by reducing the problem to multi-group learning. It overcomes the limitations of existing methods and provides improved sample complexity guarantees and simplified predictor structure.
